data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Rohtak, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rohtak, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Rohtak to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Rohtak. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, 1,061,200 people live in the county of Rohtak. Please, give them 212 new simple churches this year.
Spirit, I pray that the Jat Godara people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Rohtak, Haryana, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Rohtak, Haryana, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the county of Rohtak, Haryana, India has a population of 1,061,200.

We estimate Rohtak has 11,673 people who might know Jesus, 12,876 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,036,651 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Rohtak that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

location.name: Rohtak
location.people_groups_list: Jat Pawania, Bhat (Hindu traditions), Jat Johal, Brahmin Sankliwal, Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions)
